Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase

Class TestHTableDescriptor

java.lang.Object
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.TestHTableDescriptor
@Deprecated public class TestHTableDescriptor extends Object
Deprecated.
As of release 2.0.0, this will be removed in HBase 3.0.0 together with HTableDescriptor.
Test setting values in the descriptor
